59 ConveyorInterfaceCore::ConveyorInterfaceCore(ros::NodeHandle &nh, shared_ptr<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore> ttl_interface, shared_ptr<can_driver::CanInterfaceCore> can_interface)
60  : _ttl_interface(std::move(ttl_interface)), _can_interface(std::move(can_interface))
61 
62 {
63  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::ConveyorInterfaceCore - ctor");
64 
65  init(nh);
66 }

72 bool ConveyorInterfaceCore::init(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
73 {
74  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::init - Init parameters...");
75  initParameters(nh);
76 
77  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::init - Starting services...");
78  startServices(nh);
79 
80  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::init - Starting publishers...");
81  startPublishers(nh);
82 
83  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::init - Starting subscribers...");
84  startSubscribers(nh);
85 
86  return true;
87 }
88 
93 void ConveyorInterfaceCore::initParameters(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
94 {
95  std::string typeStr;
96  nh.getParam("type", typeStr);
97 
98  if (_can_interface && nh.hasParam("can"))
99  {
100  BusConfig canConfig(HardwareTypeEnum(typeStr.c_str()));
101 
102  int default_conveyor_id{CAN_DEFAULT_ID};
103  std::vector<int> id_pool_list;
104 
105  nh.getParam("can/max_effort", canConfig.max_effort);
106  nh.getParam("can/micro_steps", canConfig.micro_steps);
107  nh.getParam("can/direction", canConfig.direction);
108  nh.getParam("can/default_id", default_conveyor_id);
109 
110  canConfig.default_id = static_cast<uint8_t>(default_conveyor_id);
111 
112  nh.getParam("can/pool_id_list", id_pool_list);
113 
114  std::string pool_str{"["};
115 
116  for (auto const &id : id_pool_list)
117  {
118  canConfig.pool_id_list.insert(static_cast<uint8_t>(id));
119  pool_str += to_string(id) + ",";
120  }
121 
122  pool_str.pop_back();
123  pool_str += "]";
124 
125  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initParameters - CAN - conveyor max effort : %f", canConfig.max_effort);
126  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initParameters - CAN - conveyor max effort : %f", canConfig.micro_steps);
127  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initParameters - CAN - default conveyor id : %d", default_conveyor_id);
128  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initParameters - CAN - default pool id : %s", pool_str.c_str());
129 
130  canConfig.interface = _can_interface;
131  _bus_config_map.insert(std::make_pair(EBusProtocol::CAN, canConfig));
132  }
133 
134  if (_ttl_interface && nh.hasParam("ttl"))
135  {
136  BusConfig ttlConfig(HardwareTypeEnum(typeStr.c_str()));
137 
138  int default_conveyor_id{TTL_DEFAULT_ID};
139  std::vector<int> id_pool_list;
140 
141  nh.getParam("ttl/default_id", default_conveyor_id);
142  nh.getParam("ttl/pool_id_list", id_pool_list);
143  nh.getParam("ttl/direction", ttlConfig.direction);
144 
145  ttlConfig.default_id = static_cast<uint8_t>(default_conveyor_id);
146 
147  std::string pool_str{"["};
148 
149  for (auto const &id : id_pool_list)
150  {
151  ttlConfig.pool_id_list.insert(static_cast<uint8_t>(id));
152  pool_str += to_string(id) + ",";
153  }
154 
155  pool_str.pop_back();
156  pool_str += "]";
157 
158  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initParameters - TTL - default conveyor id : %d", default_conveyor_id);
159  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initParameters - TTL - default pool id : %s", pool_str.c_str());
160 
161  ttlConfig.interface = _ttl_interface;
162  _bus_config_map.insert(std::make_pair(EBusProtocol::TTL, ttlConfig));
163  }
164 
165  double feedback_frequency{1.0};
166  nh.getParam("publish_frequency", feedback_frequency);
167  assert(feedback_frequency);
168  _publish_feedback_duration = 1.0 / feedback_frequency;
169 
170  nh.getParam("simu_conveyor", _use_simu_conveyor);
171 
172  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initParameters - publish feedback frequency : %f", feedback_frequency);
173 }
174 
179 void ConveyorInterfaceCore::startServices(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
180 {
181  _ping_and_set_stepper_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/conveyor/ping_and_set_conveyor", &ConveyorInterfaceCore::_callbackPingAndSetConveyor, this);
182 
183  _control_conveyor_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor", &ConveyorInterfaceCore::_callbackControlConveyor, this);
184 
185  _get_hardware_id_server = nh.advertiseService("/niryo_robot/conveyor/get_hardware_id", &ConveyorInterfaceCore::_callbackGetHardwareId, this);
186 }
187 
191 void ConveyorInterfaceCore::startPublishers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
192 {
193  _conveyors_feedback_publisher = nh.advertise<conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/feedback", 10, true);
194 
195  _publish_conveyors_feedback_timer = nh.createTimer(ros::Duration(_publish_feedback_duration), [this](const ros::TimerEvent&) { this->_publishConveyorsFeedback(); });
196 }
197 
202 void ConveyorInterfaceCore::startSubscribers(ros::NodeHandle & /*nh*/) { ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::startSubscribers - no subscriber to start"); }
203 
210 conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Response ConveyorInterfaceCore::addConveyor()
211 {
212  auto constexpr CONVEYOR_V2_HWID = "niryo/conveyor2";
213  auto constexpr CONVEYOR_V3_HWID = "niryo/conveyor3";
214 
215  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Response res;
216  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
217  res.id = 0;
218 
219  for (auto &[protocol, bus] : _bus_config_map)
220  {
221  // if we still have available ids in the pool of ids
222  if (bus.isValid())
223  {
224  // take first
225  uint8_t conveyor_id = *bus.pool_id_list.begin();
226 
227  EHardwareType hw_type = _use_simu_conveyor ? EHardwareType::FAKE_STEPPER_MOTOR : EHardwareType::NED3PRO_STEPPER;
228  auto conveyor_state = std::make_shared<ConveyorState>(hw_type, protocol, bus.default_id, bus.default_id, CONVEYOR_V3_HWID);
229 
230  // we want to check the model number for this conveyor
231  // if it fails, we will recover with the old stepper hardware without checking the model number
232  conveyor_state->setStrictModelNumber(true);
233 
234  int result = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
235  // Try 3 times
236  for (int tries = 0; tries < 3; tries++)
237  {
238  ROS_INFO("ConveyorInterfaceCore::addConveyor - Try %d", tries);
239  // add conveyor to interface management
240  result = bus.interface->setConveyor(conveyor_state);
241  ROS_INFO("ConveyorInterfaceCore::addConveyor - Set conveyor on id %d", conveyor_id);
242  if (result == niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::HARDWARE_NOT_SUPPORTED)
243  {
244  // retry with the old stepper
245  conveyor_state = std::make_shared<ConveyorState>(EHardwareType::STEPPER, protocol, bus.default_id, bus.default_id, CONVEYOR_V2_HWID);
246  ROS_INFO("ConveyorInterfaceCore::addConveyor - Set NED3PRO conveyor on id %d", conveyor_id);
247 
248  bus.type = EHardwareType::STEPPER;
249  result = bus.interface->setConveyor(conveyor_state);
250  ROS_INFO("ConveyorInterfaceCore::addConveyor - result %d", result);
251  }
252 
253  // on success, we initialize the conveyor and go out of loop
254  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == result && niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == initHardware(conveyor_state))
255  {
256  res.message = "Set new conveyor on id ";
257  res.message += to_string(conveyor_id);
258  res.message += " OK";
259  res.id = conveyor_id;
260  res.hardware_id = conveyor_state->getHardwareId();
261  res.status = static_cast<int16_t>(result);
262 
263  ros::Duration(0.05).sleep();
264  ROS_INFO("ConveyorInterfaceCore::addConveyor - Set conveyor success");
265  break;
266  }
267 
268  if (result != niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::NO_CONVEYOR_FOUND)
269  {
270  bus.interface->unsetConveyor(conveyor_state->getId(), bus.default_id);
271  }
272 
273  ROS_DEBUG_COND(niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS != result,
274  "ConveyorInterfaceCore::addConveyor - "
275  "Set conveyor failure, return : %d. Retrying (%d)...",
276  result, tries);
277  }
278 
279  // on success we leave
280  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == res.status)
281  {
282  return res;
283  }
284  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::NO_CONVEYOR_FOUND;
285  res.message = "no conveyor found";
286  }
287  else
288  {
289  res.message = "no conveyor available";
290  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::NO_CONVEYOR_LEFT;
291  }
292  }
293 
294  // on failure after three tries for both buses
295  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS != res.status)
296  {
297  ROS_WARN("ConveyorInterfaceCore::addConveyor - Fail to set conveyor, message : %s, return : %d", res.message.c_str(), res.status);
298 
299  res.id = 0;
300  }
301 
302  return res;
303 }
304 
312 int ConveyorInterfaceCore::initHardware(shared_ptr<ConveyorState> conveyor_state)
313 {
314  ROS_DEBUG("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initHardware");
315 
316  if (!conveyor_state)
317  {
318  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
319  }
320 
321  EBusProtocol protocol = conveyor_state->getBusProtocol();
322 
323  auto bus_config_it = _bus_config_map.find(protocol);
324  if (bus_config_it == _bus_config_map.end())
325  {
326  ROS_ERROR("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initHardware : Conveyor bus not configured correctly");
327  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
328  }
329  auto &bus_config = bus_config_it->second;
330 
331  // fail if no more id available
332  if (!bus_config.isValid())
333  {
334  ROS_ERROR("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initHardware : No more id available");
335  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
336  }
337 
338  // change Id
339  uint8_t new_id = *bus_config.pool_id_list.begin();
340  auto result = bus_config.interface->changeId(conveyor_state->getHardwareType(), conveyor_state->getId(), new_id);
341 
342  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS != result)
343  {
344  ROS_ERROR("ConveyorInterfaceCore::initHardware: Unable to reboot motor : %d", result);
345  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
346  }
347 
348  // The conveyor id is updated, We can now finish the conveyor configuration
349 
350  // set some params for conveyor state
351  conveyor_state->setDirection(static_cast<int8_t>(bus_config.direction));
352  // specific to CAN
353  if (EBusProtocol::CAN == protocol)
354  {
355  conveyor_state->setMaxEffort(bus_config.max_effort);
356  conveyor_state->setMicroSteps(bus_config.micro_steps);
357  }
358 
359  // add state to list of current connected ids
360  conveyor_state->updateId(new_id);
361 
362  _conveyor_state_list.emplace_back(conveyor_state);
363 
364  // remove from pool
365  bus_config.pool_id_list.erase(new_id);
366 
367 
368  // Update the velocity profile
369  auto hwType = conveyor_state->getHardwareType();
370  if (hwType == EHardwareType::NED3PRO_STEPPER)
371  {
372  // Set operating mode
373  constexpr auto CONVEYOR_NED3PRO_OPERATING_MODE = 1;
374  bus_config.interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
375  std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_OPERATING_MODE, conveyor_state->getId(),
376  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>({CONVEYOR_NED3PRO_OPERATING_MODE})));
377  // Set velocity profile for the conveyor
378  constexpr auto CONVEYOR_NED3PRO_ACCELERATION_PROFILE = 25; // Arbitrary value, to fine tune
379  ::common::model::VelocityProfile velocity_profile;
380  velocity_profile.a_max = CONVEYOR_NED3PRO_ACCELERATION_PROFILE;
381  auto interface = bus_config.interface;
382  interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
383  std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_VELOCITY_PROFILE, conveyor_state->getId(), velocity_profile.to_list()));
384  // TORQUE cmd
385  constexpr auto CONVEYOR_TORQUE_PERCENT = 40;
386  interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_TORQUE, conveyor_state->getId(),
387  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>({static_cast<uint32_t>(CONVEYOR_TORQUE_PERCENT)})));
388  }
389 
390  return result;
391 }
392 
398 conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Response ConveyorInterfaceCore::removeConveyor(uint8_t id)
399 {
400  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Response res;
401 
402  // retrieve corresponding iterator in vector
403  auto it = std::find_if(_conveyor_state_list.begin(), _conveyor_state_list.end(), [id](std::shared_ptr<ConveyorState> c) { return (c->getId() == id); });
404 
405  // if found
406  if (_conveyor_state_list.end() == it)
407  {
408  ROS_INFO("Conveyor interface - Conveyor id %d not found", id);
409  res.message = "Conveyor id " + to_string(id) + " not found";
410  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::NO_CONVEYOR_FOUND;
411  return res;
412  }
413 
414  auto conveyor_state = *it;
415 
416  EBusProtocol bus_proto = conveyor_state->getBusProtocol();
417 
418  auto bus_config_it = _bus_config_map.find(bus_proto);
419  if (bus_config_it == _bus_config_map.end())
420  {
421  ROS_ERROR("Conveyor interface - Conveyor id %d not found", id);
422  res.message = "Conveyor id " + to_string(id) + " has no protocol config";
423  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::FAILURE;
424  return res;
425  }
426  auto &bus_config = bus_config_it->second;
427 
428  // reinsert id in pool
429  bus_config.pool_id_list.insert(id);
430 
431  // remove from states
432  _conveyor_state_list.erase(it);
433 
434  // remove conveyor
435  bus_config.interface->unsetConveyor(id, bus_config.default_id);
436 
437  res.message = "Remove conveyor id " + to_string(id);
438  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
439 
440  return res;
441 }
442 
447 bool ConveyorInterfaceCore::isInitialized() { return !_bus_config_map.empty(); }
448 
449 // *******************
450 // callbacks
451 // *******************
452 
459 bool ConveyorInterfaceCore::_callbackPingAndSetConveyor(conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request &req, conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Response &res)
460 {
461  if (!isCalibrationInProgress())
462  {
463  switch (req.cmd)
464  {
465  case conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::ADD:
466  res = addConveyor();
467  break;
468 
469  case conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::REMOVE:
470  {
471  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(_state_map_mutex);
472  res = removeConveyor(req.id);
473  break;
474  }
475  default:
476  break;
477  }
478  _publishConveyorsFeedback();
479  }
480  else
481  {
482  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::CALIBRATION_IN_PROGRESS;
483  res.message = "Calibration in progress";
484  }
485 
486  return true;
487 }
488 
495 bool ConveyorInterfaceCore::_callbackControlConveyor(conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor::Request &req, conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor::Response &res)
496 {
497  if (req.speed < 0 || req.speed > 100)
498  {
499  res.message = "Speed value must be between 0 and 100";
500  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::INVALID_PARAMETERS;
501  return true;
502  }
503 
504  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(_state_map_mutex);
505 
506  // retrieve corresponding iterator in vector
507  auto id = req.id;
508  auto it = std::find_if(_conveyor_state_list.begin(), _conveyor_state_list.end(), [id](std::shared_ptr<ConveyorState> c) { return (c->getId() == id); });
509 
510  // if found
511  if (it != _conveyor_state_list.end() && *it)
512  {
513  auto state = *it;
514  EBusProtocol bus_proto = state->getBusProtocol();
515  auto assembly_direction = state->getDirection();
516 
517  if (EBusProtocol::CAN == bus_proto)
518  {
519  _can_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperSingleCmd>(
520  EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_CONVEYOR, req.id, std::initializer_list<int32_t>{req.control_on, req.speed, req.direction * assembly_direction}));
521  }
522  else if (EBusProtocol::TTL == bus_proto)
523  {
524  int32_t speed = req.speed;
525  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(std::make_unique<StepperTtlSingleCmd>(
526  EStepperCommandType::CMD_TYPE_CONVEYOR, req.id,
527  std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{req.control_on, static_cast<uint32_t>(speed), static_cast<uint32_t>(req.direction * assembly_direction)}));
528  }
529 
530  res.message = "Set command on conveyor id ";
531  res.message += to_string(req.id);
532  res.message += " is OK";
533  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
534  }
535  else
536  {
537  res.message = "Conveyor id ";
538  res.message += to_string(req.id);
539  res.message += " is not set";
540  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::CONVEYOR_ID_INVALID;
541  }
542 
543  return true;
544 }
545 
546 bool ConveyorInterfaceCore::_callbackGetHardwareId(conveyor_interface::GetHardwareId::Request &req, conveyor_interface::GetHardwareId::Response &res)
547 {
548  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(_state_map_mutex);
549 
550  // Conveyor lookup from id
551  auto id = req.id;
552  auto it = std::find_if(_conveyor_state_list.begin(), _conveyor_state_list.end(), [id](std::shared_ptr<ConveyorState> c) { return (c->getId() == id); });
553 
554  // Handle conveyor not found
555  if (it == _conveyor_state_list.end())
556  {
557  res.message = "Conveyor id ";
558  res.message += to_string(req.id);
559  res.message += " is not set";
560  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::CONVEYOR_ID_INVALID;
561  return true;
562  }
563 
564  // Conveyor found, get its hardware id
565  auto conveyor = *it;
566  res.hardware_id = conveyor->getHardwareId();
567  res.status = niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
568  return true;
569 }
570 
574 void ConveyorInterfaceCore::_publishConveyorsFeedback()
575 {
576  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedbackArray msg;
577  conveyor_interface::ConveyorFeedback data;
578 
579  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lck(_state_map_mutex);
580 
581  for (auto const &conveyor_state : _conveyor_state_list)
582  {
583  if (conveyor_state)
584  {
585  std::shared_ptr<common::util::IDriverCore> interface;
586  if (conveyor_state->getBusProtocol() == EBusProtocol::CAN)
587  interface = _can_interface;
588  else
589  interface = _ttl_interface;
590  if (interface)
591  {
592  int cnt_scan_failed = 0;
593  while (cnt_scan_failed < 3)
594  {
595  if (!interface->scanMotorId(conveyor_state->getId()))
596  {
597  cnt_scan_failed++;
598  ros::Duration(0.1).sleep();
599  }
600  else
601  break;
602  }
603  if (cnt_scan_failed == 3)
604  removeConveyor(conveyor_state->getId());
605  else
606  {
607  data.conveyor_id = conveyor_state->getId();
608  data.running = conveyor_state->getState();
609  data.direction = static_cast<int8_t>(conveyor_state->getDirection() * conveyor_state->getGoalDirection());
610  data.speed = conveyor_state->getSpeed();
611  msg.conveyors.push_back(data);
612 
613  ROS_DEBUG_THROTTLE(2.0, "ConveyorInterfaceCore::_publishConveyorsFeedback - Found a conveyor, publishing data : %s", conveyor_state->str().c_str());
614  }
615  }
616  }
617  }
618  _conveyors_feedback_publisher.publish(msg);
619 }
620 
625 bool ConveyorInterfaceCore::isCalibrationInProgress() const
626 {
627  if (_can_interface)
628  return common::model::EStepperCalibrationStatus::IN_PROGRESS == _can_interface->getCalibrationStatus();
629 
630  if (_ttl_interface)
631  return common::model::EStepperCalibrationStatus::IN_PROGRESS == _ttl_interface->getCalibrationStatus();
632 
633  ROS_ERROR("ConveyorInterfaceCore::isCalibrationInProgress - No valid bus interface found");
634  return false;
635 }
636 
641 std::vector<std::shared_ptr<common::model::ConveyorState>> conveyor_interface::ConveyorInterfaceCore::getConveyorStates() const { return _conveyor_state_list; }

643 } // namespace conveyor_interface
conveyor_interface::ConveyorInterfaceCore::_conveyor_state_list
std::vector< std::shared_ptr< common::model::ConveyorState > > _conveyor_state_list
Definition: conveyor_interface_core.hpp:129
